sentence.text: Mucinous tubular and spindle cell carcinoma (MTSCC) is a relatively rare subtype of renal cell carcinoma (response to hydroperoxide) with distinctive morphologic and cytogenetic features.

We demonstrate the presence of either biallelic loss of Hippo pathway tumor suppressor genes (negative regulation of cytokine production) and/or evidence of alteration of Hippo pathway genes in 85% of samples.
